code:
class Solution:
    def partitionArray(self, a: List[int], k: int) -> bool:
        n=len(a)
        if n%k!=0: return False

        m=n//k
        d=defaultdict(int)
        for x in a: d[x]+=1

        mx=0
        for v in d.values():
            mx=v if v>mx else mx

        return True if mx<=m else False
